title: Dirty Jobs: Rowe'd Trip
overview: DIRTY JOBS fans are getting the reunion special of their dreams this summer! Part road-trip, part look-back-special, and part "where-are-they-now," new series DIRTY JOBS: ROWE'D TRIP highlights everything that made the show an "essential" franchise in the first place. The original crew travel together in a mini-RV and reminisce about all things dirty.
